frame.name: Representing
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> represents some <fen>Phenomenon</fen> through its existence and/or defining characteristics. Sometimes a <fen>Cognizer</fen>, a people or group of people who believe in the representation, is expressed. <ex><fex name="Entity">A bear</fex> <t>symbolizes</t> <fex name="Phenomenon">strength</fex> <fex name="Cognizer">in some cultures</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Phenomenon
FE.definition: <def-root>The event, idea, or emotion evoked by the <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Entity</fen> represents the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Entity">That mural</fex> <t>is</t> <fex name="Degree">hardly</fex> <t>a symbol</t> <fex name="Phenomenon">of what we're all about!</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time period in which the representing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the means through which the representing occurs. <ex><fex name="Phenomenon">What</fex> does <fex name="Entity">a black and white snake</fex> <t>symbolize</t> <fex name="Means">in a dream</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>An object that has some association with a <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person or group of people who believe in the representation.</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Frequency</fen> denotes how often the <fen>Entity</fen> is associated with the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the represenation logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: symbolize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: represent by means of a symbol (usually a work of art)
